articles.title: AMC signs deal to lease The Grove and Americana, two of Los Angeles' top-grossing cinemas - CNBC
articles.description: AMC is taking over the leases of cinemas at The Grove shopping complex and the Americana at Brand. Both locations were formerly operated by Pacific Theatres.
articles.content:
AMC Entertainment, the worlds largest cinema chain, is adding two more Los Angeles locations to its roster.
